extendedInfo.description: NEW and improved layout with DRAG AND DROP treeview to move files/directories around your device!!! * Featured on Life Hacker, PC World & Android Central and recommended by Motorola! The ORIGINAL, best, steadiest and most popular WiFi file transfer app with now over 1 million users across all app stores worldwide! *Browse, transfer, download, upload, delete, copy, rename, stream and manage files that are on your Android device, using a web browser via a WiFi connection. No more taking your phone apart to get the SD card out or grabbing your cable to access your camera pictures and copy across your favourite MP3s."I wholeheartedly recommend going the wireless route with WiFi File Explorer!" - PC World review - 5 stars."Best couple of bucks I ever spent." - Top app of 2011 - from Android Central's Jerry Hildenbrand.------FEATURES1. Using a web browser, you can browse and download all the files on your Android device without the need for a cable.  Download entire directories with one click which no other similar app offers;2. Multiple batch file uploads and downloads to save you time when transferring many files at once from your computer to your Android device or vice-versa;3. Backup your entire SD card or just backup individual directories with one simple click â for example, backup all your photos just by downloading the Camera directory!4. Download a streaming media playlist to allow you to quickly flick through and stream all the stored media files in a directory into a media player on your computer. This is a unique feature not offered by other apps;5. Create brand new directories and delete/rename/copy/zip/unzip files - the perfect file manager;6. Use the one of a kind gallery viewer to create a slide show of all your camera pictures directly from your Android device.  Simply click on a pictureâs file name to launch the gallery viewer and then hit the play button to enjoy all your pictures in the web browser;7. Search box so that you can find any file on your Android device;8. Select between thumbnail and detail views to choose the best method to quickly browse your files.  Thumbnails are supported for both pictures AND videos!9. It is also uniquely an installer, so automatically install app files with just once click in the web browser;10. With with one simple click you can set any audio file on your device to become your ringtone;11. View all the camera pictures and videos or listen to all the music on your Android device streamed directly in a web browser. Use shortcut tabs to quickly view âAll Musicâ, âAll Picturesâ and âAll Videosâ stored on your device, no matter which directory they are in;12. Runs as a service in the background so you can use other apps while you are making transfers;13. Simple to use with no set up or buttons â it just works!14. Password protected to prevent unwanted access;15. Ability to configure the port settings; 16. Full support for special characters in file names which competitor apps do not support;17. Visual indicators and stats of how much free space is on your Android device as well as real-time indicators of how much battery and WiFi signal you currently have;18. Send an email to the web link from the app for easy connection;19. Special âDevelopment Goodiesâ mode to enable SSL protection â email developer for details!20. LOTS more features in development;------* Before emailing, check FAQs at http://dooblou.blogspot.com ** Follow @dooblou on Twitter for all the latest news and updates as they occur ** Find us on Facebook â Search for âWiFi File Explorerâ *------If you do have problems using this application on your WiFi network, it is most likely a configuration problem with your router/network.  Please contact the developer if you have any questions and he may be able to help you ... but please don't rate low because your network isn't configured properly - that isn't the applicationâs fault ;)

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: This is a brilliant little tool that does everything it says it does. It\'s very stable and has no issues what-so-ever. For me it\'s been perfect!
reviews.author: Ryan Atkinson

reviews.title: Best way to transfer your files
reviews.comment: This is the first time ever I take my time to write a reveiw. Seriously, if there was ever money well spent, it was on this app. It\'s faster and simpler than USB plus the web interface has tons of features, like renaming, extracting zip files, create folders, etc. Thank you so much for this. Excellent work.
reviews.author: Leandro Grijio

reviews.title: I understood how it worked finally
reviews.comment: Takes a while to understand how to work this app  properly without disconnecting. Dont click on anything while uploading or it will it cuts the process.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: So nice being able to upload without a cable. Nice interface too. Would be nice to be able to upload multiple files at once though.
reviews.author: Matt Notovitz

reviews.title: keep up the great work
reviews.comment: easy to understand web design reasonable transfer times. 5 stars would only make you stop working on it, keep up the work!
reviews.author: Wes Dusek

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I recently got a new phone which is not capable of MSC type usb interactions (like a normal flash drive) and I have no interest in mtp or ptp. This is an excellent replacement.
reviews.author: Sidney Akers

reviews.title: Can\'t manage my files without it
reviews.comment: This is the only file manager I can use to move/copy files from and to my phone. Desktop software tends to be sluggish and often even refuses to function (under windows). This piece of software was worth every penny!! A must have even when one does not have the USB-cord, a memorycard reader etc.
reviews.author: Martin Broman

reviews.title: revised review
reviews.comment: Changing my rating to 5 stars. I think the problem I had was a combination of firefox fail and the upload gump appearing behind everything.  Works great!
reviews.author: Joe B

reviews.title: Exellent
reviews.comment: This makes uploading and downloading files from pc to my tablet super easy.  Well done.
reviews.author: Cazz Soso

reviews.title: Brilliant app
reviews.comment: Best value app I ever got. Very easy to use. Someone please tell me though how to see the progress of a file transferring. If the feature isn\'t there it would be great if the dev could add it. Keep up the good work :-)
reviews.author: Andy Turner

reviews.title: Best app ever!
reviews.comment: Had a problem with connecting my phone to my computer. This solved it! Worth the money!!! Can manipulate my music and pictures no problem now from any computer.
reviews.author: Erica Jewell

reviews.title: Clean. Functional. PERFECT.
reviews.comment: Supports downloads AS WELL as UPLOADS, directory creation, file tree and quick directory switching. Space stats are a bonus. (Except the \"External\" and \"Internal\" space readings both read the same storage section in a phone with \"extSdCard\" - such as the Galaxy S3. That\'s not useful but since this is not required for functionality, it\'s not an issue.)  Great job here. Better than WiFi File Transfer Pro. (Which LACKS UPLOADS.)
reviews.author: Cory Kielion

reviews.title: Amazing and productive.
reviews.comment: This is one of the most useful apps I have installed on my phone and tablet.  The one thing I would like to see is a windows/linux app that can auto find your devices and access them. That was we\'re not forced into a browser based interface.
reviews.author: Matthew LaShure

reviews.title: Best of its kind
reviews.comment: Clean, easy, stable - just works. Not bloated with a million useless features.
reviews.author: Henrik Stidsen

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is one of those rare apps I occasionally come across that completely blows me away.  The interface is simple, browser-based so it works anywhere [including Ubuntu with its disfunctional mtp implementation], and there\'s no network setup required [assuming you have dhcp]. And unlike many other \'solutions\' I\'ve tried over the last week, it just works! All my mtp hassles gone for a mere 99c! (SGS4)
reviews.author: Martin M

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: My phone usually takes FOREVER to sync with my laptop. This app is totally worth the cash and download.
reviews.author: vaughn johnson

reviews.title: Is there a way to drag & drop folders?
reviews.comment: Bought the app, and it DOES work. However, I mainly need something to help me get my music on to my SD card. It looks like in the web browser, I have to select each individual mp3. Is there a way I can just bring the entire folder over, and keep the directory tree?   I use Linux as my OS. If there\'s a SSH server that we can log in to, then we can have access to our phone through the file browser, instead of the web browser.
reviews.author: Syrinx Starr

reviews.title: Best app
reviews.comment: Good app I  can transfer my file through wifi. But don\'t like the icon please make it square.
reviews.author: Ashok Kumar

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: For me it\'s been perfect! Working like charm...All app from DOOBLOU are superb so support him.
reviews.author: Amel Brkic

reviews.title: RIVALS HAVE MOVED ON
reviews.comment: I have bought the software to support the developer, but lately I don\'t seen any improvements made to the program. Your rival software has moved on, Using Google Chrome now I can move an entire folder to my mob using their software. I expect you to add that feature as soon as possible, One star less for that, and hope u will improve the browser interface too... Otherwise I am extremely happy with the purchase.
reviews.author: Madhav A Menon
